register.title: Register
register.desc:
You should register to use chino's services!
You can register with clicking :white_check_mark: reaction!

success.title: Success!
success.desc:
You can use chino's service now.
If you are not korean, you can select other languages with {{prefix}}lang command!

success.title: 언어 변경 완료
success.desc: 이제 한국어로 치노봇을 이용하실 수 있어요!
